title: Adam's Polishes – Total Car Detailing & Cleaning Products (Bottles Only)
features: ✅ CHEMICAL PRODUCTS FOR WHEEL & TIRE AUTO DETAILING, CAR WASHING, AND PAINT PROTECTION – This bundle was created to give all auto detailing enthusiast or starters a chance at restocking or building their detailing arsenal with premium car cleaning products. When this bundle arrives at your house, you can expect to receive a four 16oz chemical products. Car Shampoo, Wheel & Tire Cleaner, CS3 Ceramic Waterless Wash & Tire Shine.

✅ WHEEL & TIRE DETAILING – With the Adam’s Wheel & Tire Cleaner, you can combine two jobs into one. Our Wheel & Tire Cleaner effectively cleans yours wheels by pulling surfactants of your wheels and eliminating brake dust. On your tires, it activates fast on contact, eliminating harsh oxidation and tire blooming. Once your tires are clean, follow up with our Tire Shine for a lustrous dark shine!

✅ CAR CLEANING PRODUCTS – We can proudly attest to our Car Shampoo and simply say that it doesn’t get much better. It really is a formula of perfection - You can use our car wash soap in sunlight without the worry of spotting. It is pH neutral and will not strip your car wax, coating, or sealant protection. Best of all, it produces thick suds or snow foam in a bucket, foam cannon or foam gun that lubricates your paint without the worry of introducing scratches or swirls to your paint.

✅ CERAMIC WATERLESS WASH PAINT PROTECTION – Adam’s CS3 is a ceramic infused, three-in-one waterless wash detailer. It gives your paint protection like our Ceramic Spray Coating but also has the added benefit of cleaning your paint without a hose and water. Do not worry about scratches as it lubricates your paint with smearing, scratching, or streaking. After each use, you’ll notice enhanced clarity in gloss, depth and slickness!

✅ 110% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE & USA MADE - At Adam’s, we strive to bring the BEST car cleaning supplies, auto detailing kits, washing accessories, microfiber towels, waxes, sealants, ceramic coatings, mops, brushes, mitts, sponges, garage tools, applicators & other high-quality car cleaning products to the car care industry. If you are not satisfied, let us know & we’ll do everything we can to make it right!
description: Includes four 16oz bottles - Car Shampoo, CS3, Wheel & Tire Cleaner, and Tire Shine!
